statements: SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id, purchase_date, payment_amount FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date, payment_amount, purchase_id FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, product_id, purchase_id, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id, payment_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT user_id, product_id, amount FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id, amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions >= 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING average_purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, currency_balance FROM virtual_currency ORDER BY currency_balance DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, purchase_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM in_app_purchases WHERE item_name LIKE '%Gold%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(currency_balance) AS total_balance FROM virtual_currency GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 500;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, v.currency_balance FROM transactions t INNER JOIN virtual_currency v ON t.user_id = v.user_id WHERE v.currency_balance < 0;
SELECT i.item_name, p.price, t.transaction_date FROM in_app_purchases i INNER JOIN transactions t ON i.purchase_id = t.purchase_id WHERE t.user_id = 1001 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT user_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE last_login IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, i.product_name, i.purchase_amount FROM users u JOIN in_app_purchases i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT u.username, w.wallet_balance, c.transaction_amount, c.transaction_date FROM users u JOIN user_wallet w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN currency_transactions c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE w.wallet_balance > 100 AND c.transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY c.transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM app_users;
SELECT username, email FROM app_users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM virtual_currency WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE balance < 1000;
SELECT * FROM app_users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM app_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, w.balance, v.currency_name FROM app_users u JOIN user_wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN virtual_currency v ON w.currency_id = v.currency_id WHERE w.balance > 1000;
SELECT u.username, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM app_users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount FROM app_users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
